meanings.definition: Cause (someone) to be a victim again.
meanings.sent1: Seeing the crime scene photos again revictimizes the survivor.
meanings.sent2: The bully's hurtful words can revictimize the victim.
meanings.sent3: The movie plot revictimizes the main character in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The harsh reality of the situation revictimizes her innocence.
meanings.sent5: The news article's graphic details revictimizes the reader's emotions.

meanings.sent1: Continuing to harass the victim revictimizes them.
meanings.sent2: The scammer's actions only serve to revictimize the vulnerable population.
meanings.sent3: The persistent telemarketer seems to revictimize the poor receptionist daily.
meanings.sent4: The repeated insults revictimizes the individual's self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The ongoing abuse revictimizes the already traumatized survivor.
